select
DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%d') AS currTime,
DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%d') AS currTime,
DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%H') AS currTime,
t1.deviceId AS deviceId, t5.type AS deviceType, t4.orgCode AS orgCode, t4.orgName AS orgName, t5.deviceName AS deviceName, ( SELECT t2.attrValue FROM attr_value t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.foreignId AND t1.currTime = t2.currTime AND t2.attrKey = 'LNG液位' AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) AS lngLiquidPosition FROM attr_key t1, sys_orga t4, sys_device t5 WHERE t1.orgId = t4.id AND t1.deviceId = t5.deviceId and t5.type = '01' AND t1.delFlag = '0' AND t4.delFlag = '0'
and t4.orgName like '%${orgName}%'
and t4.orgCode = '${orgCode}'
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%Y%m') = '${currYearMonth}'
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%Y%m') = '${yearMonth}'
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%Y%m%d') = '${date}'
GROUP BY deviceId, DATE_FORMAT(t1.currTime,'%d') ORDER BY deviceId, currTime
